alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Geneva and north central Walton Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Samson, or 12 miles east of Florala, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Samson, Earlytown, Hacoda, Pera, Gaskin, Weeks, Ganer, Marl, Lowery and Logan Field Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
